analyzed: bde ba chen po de yang rtogs par 'gyur bas don gyis stong par byed pa'o/_/theg pa sman pa
translated: Since that great bliss is also realized, it is made empty of meaning.

original: las zlog nas 'di man chad rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/_/'das par shes gzung ba'i yul lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'o/_/
analyzed: las zlog nas 'di man chad rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o/_/'das par shes gzung ba'i yul lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'o/_/
translated: The stage of completion is from here on.🔽Since the mind that apprehends the object does not exist, the object🔽that is apprehended is also nonexistent.🔽The example of this is like the🔽difference between the Pāramitā Vehicle and the Mantra Vehicle.

original: 'bring gis 'dzin pa'i sems kyang med na/_rang gis ni yul pha rol tu phyin pa las sngags khyad par 'di'i dpe
analyzed: 'bring gis 'dzin pa'i sems kyang med na/_rang gis ni yul pha rol tu phyin pa las sngags khyad par 'di'i dpe

analyzed: yang gser 'gyur gyi rnam pa bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/rnam pa kun ldan gyi stong pa'i dngos
translated: jewel and a jewel that is not a wish-fulfilling jewel.🔽The example of this🔽is like the difference between a wish-fulfilling tree and a tree that is not🔽a wish-fulfilling tree.

original: po ma spangs  'bras bu ji ltar thob par 'gyur ba ni/_yang dag pa'i don sgom pa rab

original: kyi mtha' las skyes pa'i shes pa/_mchog tu gyur pa'i bde ba chen po/_mya ngan las🔽'das pa'i sa chen po'i dbyings/_khyad par can du byed gzhi 'gyur ba'i lam yin pas so/_/spangs pa'i🔽ye shes sangs rgyas kyi chos phyin ci ma log pas gong ma bzhi po lta ba phyag rgya bzhi ting 'dzin sgrib pa zad pa/
analyzed: kyi mtha' las skyes pa'i shes pa/_mchog tu gyur pa'i bde ba chen po/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa chen po'i dbyings/_khyad par can du byed gzhi 'gyur ba'i lam yin pas so/_/spangs pa'i ye shes sangs rgyas kyi chos phyin ci ma log pas gong ma bzhi po lta ba phyag rgya bzhi ting 'dzin sgrib pa zad pa/
translated: The wisdom of abandonment is the wisdom of the four unmixed qualities of Vajrasattva.🔽The wisdom of abandonment is the unmistaken qualities of buddhahood.

original: gsal ba zhen pa med pa lha dang mi'i bde ba las ma rmongs pa dang thabs mang ba dang rka ba med pa dbang po rnon po'i yul
analyzed: gsal ba zhen pa med pa lha dang mi'i bde ba las ma rmongs pa dang thabs mang ba dang rka ba med pa dbang po rnon po'i yul
translated: The four are the view, the four mudras, the exhaustion of the obscurations of samadhi, and the clarity that is free from attachment.🔽The wisdom of abandonment is the object of those with sharp faculties.

original: yin pa bzhi'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi dngos gzhir gyur pa'o/_/
analyzed: yin pa bzhi'o/_/rdo rje sems dpa'i rang ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi dngos gzhir gyur pa'o/_/
translated: The wisdom of abandonment is the main subject of the eighteen unmixed qualities of Vajrasattva.

analyzed: des na chos nyid don chen po'i las ni mnyams pa la/_pha rol tu phyin pa man chad ltar nang nas
